author: eptwts
text:
i think i've tweeted this like 10 times already but it's one of the most important lessons you can learn so here comes the 11th...

the first step to blowing up on social media is realizing you're not interesting & nobody gives a fuck about you

it's not that people are incapable of giving a fuck about you - it's that they have no reason to invest their time into consuming your content to even build that "connection"

would you guys know anything about "EP" if all i tweeted about was my own personal life & nothing of value?

of course not

so the question shifts to -> how can i make people invest time into consuming my content? how do i make it worth their time? what do they give a fuck about?

the answer is their own personal benefit...

hence why your content should be centered around value, every piece of content targeted at one of your ICP's desires

value is the way forward in 99% of cases
